content.detailedDescription: Halfway up the dirt road getting into mataguay scout reservation in san diego county, off to the north a few hundred yards was a pulsating red light, it wasn't a fire, and i know it was not an airplane, it was to dark to see exactly what, but with the few glimmers left of sunlight i could tell what it wasn't. there were sheriffs police and fire trucks but no paramedics, they were sure to to let anybody near the area, there was no smoke or fire, just the red pulsing light, about an hour later when we wee heading back down the dirt road there was nothing there, no lights no cops, no nothing.
content.summary: Ufo crash

content.detailedDescription:
Hi there,

i was walking along thames river path on above mentioned date and time for sight seeing and to see proposed art on thames river exhibition.
i was on north bank of river opposite to mayor's building. i was just taking photos of nice night scene of tower bridge and pier lit in green.

i took below attached photo of tower bridge and mayors building with pier in view on above mentioned time. i used my sony ericsson k800i phone with 3.2 cybershot camera. i have submitted two photos in previous report and this is just after that lets say in 15min after when i was on tower bridge i took one photo looking south side of the bridge from middle. i saw some weird object in my mobile screen after taking photo so i again quickly take another snap in almost same position. and again after that i take few more photos but in these two photos this oval shaped object is visible. this obejct wasn't visible with naked eye. it was only on photo. 
it was bit strange cause in none of other photos anything like that appear. it also dosne't look like some kind of light refection or..Light scattering .
i suspected that it might be some dust particles on my mobile phone lenses and due to lighting it glows like that. but it wasn't present in all other images which i took on that day. quite strange. i don't know what it is.
they are prominent in these two images.
could it be ufo? i don't think it's stars or planes. 

it would be fascinating to see if anyone else reported it or found same things in their photos. cause that day it was very nice day clear sky and many tourists around.

thanks for investigating and providing this facility to report.
i hope some of your scientists would help me out in this regard.

i have attached 3 photos here.
content.summary: Oval shapped object with some kind of aura around and bright middle part

content.detailedDescription: It was approvimately 10:30 p.M. at night. i had gone outside to look at the stars. i was facing east. i saw a jet in the sky moving from west to east very high. imediately after sighting the jet, i saw a bright, fast ,moving white sphere like object moving from the south to the north. it crossed behind the jet. as it crossed behind the jet, it(jet) changed course and started in the direction of the object. appeared to be in pursuit of this object. suddenly the object disappeared, and at that time, the jet changed course again and continued in its original path. the next night at work, i started to tell a friend of mine what i had seen, and before i could even get a whole sentence out, he said "i saw it too". we both couldn't wait to contact each other about this event and were so excited that we both witnessed the same thing. it was good to have some validation. exciting doesn't even begin to describe my feelings. awesome, maybe!!!
content.summary: Witnessed a jet and an unexplained bright light/fast moving

content.detailedDescription:
At approx. 12:15 a.M. on sunday, 9/28/08 outside of new columbia, pa at the base of a mountain,  i witnessed 3 glowing circular objects moving across the sky.  initially, i thought it was aircraft, but these objects were moving slower than an aircraft.  it was very cloudy & foggy tonight.  these objects were clearly visible, travelling under cloud cover.  i watched these objects for approx. 20 seconds before running and getting friends to see this.  when we returned, the initial 3 were gone, but 3 more appeared on the horizon through the trees.  again, these 3 objects were glowing and circular moving in a straight line, one after the other across the sky.  all 6 in total were an orange color & were travelling west.  there were no flashing lights, but each seemed to have a haze around them.  from where we were standing, they were about 4 inches apart in the sky.  we then watched these objects slowly disappear / vanish in the sky.  they did not emit any sounds we could hear.  this incident, from initial sighting to last sighting lasted about 1 minute.

1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
i was at a party (i was not drinking as i was the designated driver) returning from my car.

2. what made you first notice the object?
i just, for whatever reason, happened to look up... 

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
 first i thought they were planes-  airplane lights are not one sole color & generally blink.

4. describe the object and its actions and motions.
see paragraph above.

5.  describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.
i was shocked, total disbelief of what i was seeing.  i'm still in disbelief, but know what i saw.

6.  how did you lose sight of the object?
the objects just seemed to vanish / disappear / fade out of sight.
content.summary: 6 orange sphere / circles move in line across sky heading west.

content.detailedDescription: August 7 2008. i was traveling on interstate 81 through virgina. it was about 4:30 am. i noticed a bright yellow sphere with orange. it looked like a full moon. it was to the left of the highway in an open field. i told my sister in law to look. she just caught a little of it. then we lost sight of it because of the trees. the moon was cresent that night. and if it was the sun, where was the horizon?
content.summary: Bright yellow orange sphere about the size of a full moon.

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of february 18, 1978. i went to check on my clothes in the laundry room. i lived in a apartment complex. in summerville s.C. i left the laundry room and ran back to my apt, but i had to stop and look around. i felt as if i was going to be attacked. there was no one. but then i looked up and saw a beautiful oval shape craft. it was about 60 feet in lengh. it was hoving above the trees. about 50 feet up. and it stayed there for at least five minutes. there was a light humming sound. the color was metalic blue.It had three flood lights,vents and a circular shape in the middle. it was so beatiful, no screws or bolts. i was not afraid. i thought to myself that these beings were not monsters. but that they were just like us. i turned my head and noticed that my friend on the second story, with her window shades wide open and her lights on, she was watching also. i then watched the craft assend slowly up and then it shot up into space and stopped, then it shot to the left. i was amazed at what i had just witnessed.
content.summary: Hovering above me ,metalic blue oval craft with three flood lights. each light was spaced between each vent. three vents in all. canister shape in the middle.  i was fasinated with seeing it.

content.detailedDescription: Was outside playing with my son he said dady look at the plane i looked up saw the plane but also two black objects almost stright with a slight chevron the span was very very big compared to the aircraft flying in to land at salt lake city airport and they were much higher up no noise one stayed motionless the other would move out and then come back nerar the other one it was in the sky in the south end of the valley sandy area but you could probably see it from whole valley i do not know what these craft were and i am familer with milatary and comercial aircraft i asked my niebor what he thoght the were he was able to zoom in with his camara and got a good picture of both of them we watched them for half an hour they got higher and higher then  there was a flash of light very bright and they were gone i felt confused and alot of energy after seeing these objects
content.summary: 2 objects sat in the sky no noise while planes flew into slc black in color very very big compared to the aaircraft flying into slc

content.detailedDescription: Bright light in western sky right at sunset approximately 3 fingers from horizon with fingers spread (method used to id. altitude while standing watches on navy ships).  could have been a star or planet but, it dropped towards the horizon quickly.  color was bright white light similar to star.  color and size did not change.  object moved in one direction and constant speed toward horizon.  speed was barely detectable with naked eye.  used tree limbs as reference to detect movement.
content.summary: Bright light in western sky

content.detailedDescription:
i'm 66 years old male.
i was riding in the back seat of a freinds car,with my wife,i was on 
the right side.
i was looking at my wife to my left. and i seen out her window
something i have never seen before.

it was low flying maybe 3 hundred feet high.It was bright
orange. i could see it maybe 4 seconds it was going stright. with a flat
trajectorey.It was going faster than anything i have ever seen.Like a tracer bulit.Way biger than a airplane.
i called the kenosha news the next day they said they had several 
other reports of seeing this ufo.  i seen this in 2007 i'm not realy
sure of the date.

there were 4 of us in the car i was the only one to see it,because
i was the only one looking in that direction. about 2 seconds
after i seen it, i said hey you guys [ i just seen a flying sauser.]

                 larry valentine
content.summary: I seen a ufo , nothing like i ever seen before

content.detailedDescription:
At 8:30pm decided to look at stars it was a really clear night. we live close to port of los angeles so it is very rare to see that many stars so clearly. i looked up and saw what looked like a star moving at a high rate from the direction of catalina island north. i then called my  3 kids to come out ( ages 13, 11, 8) to see if they would see anything and few minutes later another star like object appeared moving in the same direction at same speed and then slowed down. my kids were screaming. then in the blink of an eye i don't what was but a streak of light sparked across the sky north the same direction where the object had slowed down. it then picked up speed and another one appears going south toward catalina island. about 5 minutes past and then another one appeared going east to west we watched it did not take ekes off of it and it disappeared right before our eyes. these were not planes, we live under the flight path of lomita airport, and sometime depending on conditions long beach airport changes there flight patern. these were not military planes doing there normal patrols of the los angeles harbor. these objects were star like in apperence moving faster then military jets able to slow down and flying at such a high altitude that i think its impossible. please contact me and let me know if anyone else wittnessed this. there is something going on it almost looked like the video that's on youtube from the space shuttle where you see multiple about flying about and weapons being fired at these objects. this very real my children witnessed it along with me.
thank you maria ford
content.summary: Fast moving multiple objects and moving north south and east

content.detailedDescription: I was awakened out of a sound sleep about 3-4am by very bright lights passing behind the trees outside my bedroom/sunroom to the east. the lights were moving slowly and without any sound and appeared to be not more than 30-40 feet off the ground, although i could not tell how far away they were and i live on a hill, so they could have been up higher off the ground below the hill. i got up and ran into the sunroom where i stared at the lights, first telling myself that it must be a car going up the hill, but then realizing that the hill was not that high, so that it must be something else. i then thought maybe it was the medivac flight for life helicopter making a landing at the hospital nearby at the bottom of the hill, but there was no sound. there is no ambient light in my neigborhood either...No street lights of any kind and no house light were on at that time, so it was very dark . the lights drifted up the hill towards the mountain behind this area (shadow mountain) and then made a sharp u turn and came straight back at a higher altitude. at that point i recall saying out loud, "holy [pd]"!! and thinking to myself that i must be seeing a ufo.... oddly enough, i do not recall anything after that, and the next morning i did not remember that the event had occurred at all. i woke up feeling as if i had a hangover; my eyes were red, i had bags under my eyes and i felt very fuzzy and tired even though i assumed that i must have gone back to bed and slept for several more hours. even the following day i still felt strangely exhausted and had bags under my eyes, but at the same time i felt energized and excited mentally. i did not think about or remember the event at all until the afternoon of friday the 26th when a friend called me and read me an article in the newspaper about a ufo sighting in the valley at the very same time that i had had this experience. i went out and got the newspaper, read the article myself, and then called the sheriff's department, because one of the deputies had also seen this object, as well as a local woman who lives near me, whom they then had call me. the memory of the event started to come back to me as i discussed it with both of them. we all saw "something", but the deputy is still convinced that it was just a small plane flying low and disappearing over a hill (the same hill where the other woman had her sighting, which is also just to the west of where i live) even though no planes can land here at 3-4am because the airport is closed then. the sightings had some similarities, although it seemed that the object was changing shape, color and speed. i have put in a call to air traffic control today to check on the presence of any aircraft in the area at that time, but they do not open until monday, so i have not been able to talk to them. an aircraft could not have made that sharp u turn that i observed, however; not even a helicopter. i also called [l. s.], and i even gave his number to the newspaper, who also called me, since they said that they did not know where to report this, but [l.S] has not returned my call yet. i then remembered that mufon takes reports, so here it is.....The other woman just called me and we had a very interesting chat about "it all" including several other similar strange experiences that we have both had. she may file a report with you as well.......
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Several large bright white lights followed by or mixed with smaller red lights

content.detailedDescription:
Ok, this is the second time i'm typing this, since the first one didn't go through.  
first of all, we live on a military base so i could have seen anything.
we don't have a great view of the sky either, so i consider myself lucky to have seen what i saw.
it was just after 9pm and i went outside to potty the dogs.  the sky was pretty clear, directly above me was cassiopeia (if that helps) and i was facing what i believe to be northeast.
at first i thought it was a squirrel running across the power lines which is how it caught my eye.  then i realized it wasn't on the power lines but above.  the whole "sighting" last a few seconds so it's hard to describe. i saw this dark v-shaped object (or objects) literally gliding by.  no sound which is what confused me the most i believe.  at first i thought it was a flock of birds flying, but i realized it was "gliding" too fast and kept it's shape the whole time.  it's hard to describe because the sky was dark, there was light pollution in the direction it was flying and the object itself was dark (no lights) and it just blended into the darkness after a couple seconds.
i always thought i would be scared to see a ufo but this happened so quickly and suddenly i actually felt elated and lucky to have glimpsed it in the first place!  i immediately went in to tell my husband and he came out and i was hoping it would come back so he wouldn't think i was crazy (too late!) but it never came back.  he seems to think it was a stealth bomber, but what i saw i wouldn't call "solid" or a "triangle".  it was a v, and the word "inky" keeps coming to mind to describe it's blackness.  i don't really want to get too involved but i wanted to report it just the same. i don't know what i saw, but i described it as best i could.
content.summary: Black v gliding aross black skies

content.detailedDescription: I was going to the store with my daughter and stepped outside to get in the truck. as we usually do at night we both look for the stars and moon. as i was pointing out stars to her i noticed what at first seemed to be a small star cluster obscured by the city lights, except it started moving. my daughter sensed something was out of place when i asked her "what is that?" she buried her head into my shoulders as i followed it, with a sense of wonder and a little fear/excitement. i am not sure what shape it was as it did not have defined edges, possible oval, diamond, or square. as i followed it for what was a little over 1/2 a minute it finally went out of site/focus. i initially thought it was maybe a flock of birds, but the formation was very tight and stable, like one single object, and when i initially saw it it was not moving, or moving slowly directly overhead, which is how i was able to spot it. i could only guesstimate the elevation of approx 1500ft. it was like small points of very faint light ever so slightly connected to each other, like a transparent single object. we live in an approach lane for dfw airport, this object was moving west to east. the planes are easily spotted moving east to west. very strange, i cannot stop thinking about what it was.
content.shape: Circle,  Diamond,  Oval,  Square,  Rectagular,  Unknown
content.summary: Transparent almost invisible

content.detailedDescription:
at work in wallingford, ct. went to loading dock at rear of building
 for a smoke break. while standing on the loading dock a large object
 caught my eye. the object was traveling south to north and at a high rate
 of speed. altitude was hard to discern as a cloudless sky and no size
 reference. best guess 1 to 2 thousand feet. observed object for approx. 
 6 to 8 seconds until tree line obscured it. waited to hear the sound of 
 engines or some propulsion noise but none heard! speed hard to say, best
 guess would be around 3 to 4 hundred mph. object was golden in color.
 same color as pure gold, had a orange tinge to it and was enveloped
 by a aura of same color. no visible windows or openings.
 right away i told all at the shop what i'd seen! i also told them
 that i was thrilled to have been so  fortunate to have experenced such
 an event! the area where the object was viewed should have been seen
 by many many people. kept waiting for reports of sightings but none
 were ever reported.
  spent over 4 years in usaf as a weapons control repair tech.
 in the 50's, early 60's. just turned 70 ! not prone to fantasy.
content.summary: sited object traveling so. to no. at high speed. no sound. large, golden!

content.detailedDescription: 1/20 ufo story .... my words on this event ...... on jan. 20th of this year we packed up our camera and the movement tv crew hit the road from orlando for tampa and st pete. we were headed out there to cover a car show that was being hosted by young dro in st pete. we were supposed to cover, birdman and cash money records in tampa at club 112. i was with award winning female rap artist [pid], and acoustic folk singer [pid]. we were excited about covering these events and getting some good interviews. we got on the road and headed out to st pete. it was late in the afternoon just before night fell when we were on the bridge (i 275 headed south bound) that connects tampa and st pete, its a pretty long bridge and we missed out turn when we reached the st pete side. we had to turn around. we went back across the bridge and ill be honest we were lost. we went across that bridge twice and we were headed back for the third time. we got a call from the promoter in st pete saying that the car show was canceled. we decided to just head back to tampa grab a drink and head home. we said screw it we weren't even interested in covering the cash money concert in tampa that night. we were about to get on that bridge again when we were on the on ramp [pid] and [pid] both were talking about the sky. they wanted me to tape the sky.. it was a brilliant color, a very nice night. i wasn't really interested in shooting the sky line but it was a really pretty sight i took the camera out and taped the sky. it was at that point that [pid] and [pid] started yelling about lights in the sky. ill be honest at first i couldn't even see the lights. i was turning the camera on and making sure everything was in focus when i first made eye contact with what looked like a bright light and it disappeared and reappeared. i couldn't believe at one point i couldn't even find the lights. i remember [pid] yelling the lights are spitting red stuff. a chill went down my spine when i found the lights. i thought to myself ufo. i was saying to myself don't mess this up. i actually missed maybe the first ten to twenty seconds messing with the camera and trying to find the lights in the sky. it was like the light was calling us. its at this point the story gets crazy. the lights seemed to be putting on some sort of fireworks show. i told them to put the passenger side window down. the lights seemed to literally jump from one location in the sky to another. it seemed like it just went on forever the lights flying around in circles ... it wasn't a fireworks display. fireworks have to fly up from somewhere and they fall down. it wasn't a plane i didn't know what it was ... i got a cold chill at one pint and i blurted out "babylon" i felt fear for a second. then the lights seemed to merge and it looked like they turned to into a fireball or a comet. only it didn't fly straight down. it made a turn that i thought was impossible a sharp 180 degree turn! it picked up speed and shot to the ground. at that point i said to [pid], "that [pd] is crashing son" ... then it shot up in the sky and i remember saying "we wont see no more" i was disappointed. while we were on that bridge we could see people in other cars pointing at it and when we came off the bridge cars were pulling over looking. we kept on going. it was a good thing we kept going. when we thought the ufo was gone we were sitting down in shock. i remember hearing someone light up a cigarette that is how quiet the car was. i was in shock i was just holding the camera out the window. i wasn't shooting anything in particular i was just in shock i couldn't move. after a while i remember someone saying that is some crazy [pd]. and it was. i can still remember [pid] asking if it was a full moon that night and it was. i called our editor and told him that i just shot the greatest ufo footage ever. he hung up on me i cant blame him though. we got back to orlando. i left the tape with the editor and he called me later and told me that i did shoot the greatest ufo footage ever. he was so excited he told me that there were a few more thing that we missed. after we thought the ufo crashed it was following us. i watched the tape and i was so surprised. he slowed it down frame by frame and showed me the ufo flying ahead of us. he showed me where the ufo really left. it flew behind a building and it looked like a shooting star. he also showed me something else some sort of light appeared on the skyline during the light show. it appears to fly behind a building. i have no way of telling if it flew behind the building or not. it could have been an illusion. regardless it was there on the tape none of us noticed it on the bridge. we came up with a plan. we posted a short video of the incident on our blip.Tv page, myspace and youtube. the response was overwhelming. long story story short the video got picked up on wftv.Com (orlando's abc affiliate) we got the footage copy written and we prepared for a media storm. "not on our radar at all," lt. rebecca heyse, public affairs officer for macdill air force base, told wftv.Com, adding that they have no reports of similar sightings on january 20. wow the air force had no idea that something was flying around a major city. a few days later wftv reported on its site that a t-6 plane used in the bill leff starfire night skyshow, was flying that day. wow this flame in the sky that wasn't on the air force,s rader was now a plane. i was like wow this is a cover up. i googled bill leff and watched his air show on youtube.Com its a great air show but it looks like nothing that i taped on the 20th of jan 20008. they were trying to debunk us. i knew what was up then it had to be a grass roots movement to get this out to the people. it became a passion of mine because i want to know whats going on. if the government knows they need to disclose this to us because we have a right to know. i have been in touch with bill birnes form ufo magazine and history channels ufo hunters show. i cant tell if they want to show the truth or just show poorly shot footage of suspected ufox and having people talk about their experiences with no evidence. we are putting this out for the world to see. check out bill leff's airshow and compare it to what we saw. air shows are loud this thing i in the sky that we saw made no noise. air shows are held at night this happened before night fell over the sky. this incident has changed all of us that were in the car that day. [pid] already a respected artist in the orlando scene and an award winning mc has shifted her music to more spiritual rhymes. she is on a mission to share her truth with the wold through her music. she is one of the few rappers that has actually brought up ufos in her music. she is constantly on a mission to find and share the truth . [pid] life has been affected as well as his music. as for me i'm trying to bring the truth out i don't care about what it is if its police brutality that i see and shoot with my camera ill bring that to the world if its a ufo ill bring that to the wold to. i ask everyone to look at this video make an informed decision and remember that if we don't demand the truth the government will continue to lie. i have no idea what that was but it was no plane and ill keep saying that to my grave. you can view the video for yourself ..Menttelelvision.Blip.Tv and you can reach me at myspace.Com/supreme407 or movementtelevision@gmail.Com
content.summary: Star like objects flashed around the sky turned into some comet like looking objects followed us and flew behind a building like a shooting star

content.detailedDescription:
Location ;  liverpool, england
whilst walking my dog today with my partner tre, at about 11am this morning i glanced up to the sky to see an aeroplane and what seemed like a couple of red spheres come into the sky from nowhere. the spheres started to change into a white colour after about 1 minute. they were flying faster than the plane but not in any formation at first. then more started to appear up until about a total of 15 spheres started to slow and follow in the slip stream of the plane. i watched this occur for about 10 minutes until the sight of the plane and the spheres disappeared into the distance.
when i got home, i got out my sat nav  and recorded the exact location.
both i and my partner witnessed this occurence. i also remember that each sphere had a white " aura " about it. in size to the plane, they were about
15 of them side by side equalled 3/4 of the plane.
i am saying this is a possible sighting because of their speed, appearance from nowhere, the aura of the spheres, trailing the plane ( which i guess was a passenger jet at @ 20,000 feet ), the ability to be so close together as a bundle until they fell into a formation of following the plane. unfortunately, i could not  take a photograph with my mobile phone as it was a sunny morning and to high for a picture. the spheres did not appear to be balloons as their actions were to deliberate.
content.summary: Sighting in sky of approx  15 white spheres following a aeroplane.

content.detailedDescription:
It was a clear summer sky. i looked up and saw three black orbs in the sky.I had know idea what it was. the orbs apeared to be floating around eachother. the orbs flew horizontaly. i'm guessing they flew about the hight of a normal airplane and about as fast. i was pretty exited about the sighting, i told the people in the neighbourhood and they saw it too. in total about 10 people in my neighbourhood saw the objects the sighting took pretty long but eventualy they flew out of sight.

extra info: i live near a airforce millitary base, frequently helicopters and f16's fly over.
content.summary: Three black orbs floating silently through the sky

content.detailedDescription: It was about 11pm and i was laying in bed awake when i chanced to look for the occasional uh-60 blackhawk out the window, but what i saw threw my body into overdrive. at first, being a believer in ufo's, i assumed thats what it was.  so as i looked closer i saw a thin blue light screaming by at low level heading northeast at a precise altitude.  i immediatly bolted for my camera phone and snapped a picture as it screamed to the angle where my windowsill covered it.  what i saw when i zoomed in was a bright light surrounded by what looked to be a cloud of vapor.  i continued to watch it as i took mental notes on position, hight, sound, and i even took the time to clock the relative speed.  i placed it at about 300ft. off the ground which was roughly eye level.  i worked out the speed to be somewhere around 1000mph, and created a mental picture of it for on the spot referencing.  it seemed to be traveling northeast, which fits the object based on the only other report from the state.  today i had an old friend look it it to confirm that it was not a military jet, however i knew it couldn't be due to the fact that the traffic pattern for all three of the airports in my area go over the other side of the property.  as my friend reviewed it she came to the conclusion that the light was created by a strong artificially created electromagnetic force field.  unfortunately the color of the object was distorted while transfering the digital photo to my computer.  this caused it to turn green.  she also inferred that for 1 milisecond the objects light seemed to dim, as if it started to move away as soon as i saw it, or it saw me.  i was referred here by that friend in hopes of finding more information, and i ask that no official investigations be conducted.  the only way i would like to be contacted is through my email, thunderbolt31@hotmail.Com, by other witnesses only.
content.summary: Blue light flew by my window, i grabbed my camera phone and snapped a picture

content.detailedDescription: It was about 11pm and i was laying in bed awake when i chanced to look for the occasional uh-60 blackhawk out the window, but what i saw threw my body into overdrive. at first, being a believer in ufo's, i assumed thats what it was.  so as i looked closer i saw a thin blue light screaming by at low level heading northeast at a precise altitude.  i immediatly bolted for my camera phone and snapped a picture as it screamed to the angle where my windowsill covered it.  what i saw when i zoomed in was a bright light surrounded by what looked to be a cloud of vapor.  i continued to watch it as i took mental notes on position, hight, sound, and i even took the time to clock the relative speed.  i placed it at about 300ft. off the ground which was roughly eye level.  i worked out the speed to be somewhere around 1000mph, and created a mental picture of it for on the spot referencing.  it seemed to be traveling northeast, which fits the object based on the only other report from the state.  today i had an old friend look it it to confirm that it was not a military jet, however i knew it couldn't be due to the fact that the traffic pattern for all three of the airports in my area go over the other side of the property.  as my friend reviewed it she came to the conclusion that the light was created by a strong artificially created electromagnetic force field.  unfortunately the color of the object was distorted while transfering the digital photo to my computer.  this caused it to turn green.  she also inferred that for 1 milisecond the objects light seemed to dim, as if it started to move away as soon as i saw it, or it saw me.  i was referred here by that friend in hopes of finding more information, and i ask that no official investigations be conducted.  the only way i would like to be contacted is through my email, thunderbolt31@hotmail.Com, by other witnesses only.
content.summary: Blue light flew by my window, i grabbed my camera phone and snapped a picture

content.detailedDescription:
Standing on deck looking at the sky when i noticed that there was a really bright star that shouldn't be in that spot of the night sky.  watched it for about 5 minutes, started flashing.  didn't move at all, but kept getting brighter and putting off red and blue flashes.  grabbed binoculars and realized it was actually a cluster of 3 lights, white, red, and blue.  at first the lights were horizontally aligned, then would instantly change, though didn't see the transition, to a pyramid shape, then to two, one on top of the other, with the third next to it.  the lights pulsed one at a time, going around the formation.  they were very rhythmic in their movement.

about 15 or 20 minutes later, it still hadn't moved, when a plane came close to it.  the plane had to suddenly adjust its course and go up and over it very quickly.  as it did this, the lights jerked sideways, like they were moving out of the way.  

all in all, the lights stayed for almost 45 minutes in the same spot, and were relatively low, lower than normal air traffic.  there wasn't a sound associated with it either. 

the light then faded, almost like it was receding and heading n, nw, but staying at the same elevation, and then disappeared.
content.summary: Blue, white, red light formation in nw sky, facing sedalia, from castle rock, off of rt 85

content.detailedDescription: On friday september 26th 2008, between 10pm and 10:15 pm est my girlfriend and i observed what appeared to be a ufo.  it was flying low no higher than 250 feet any aircraft would have been audible at that altitude.  it had a very bright steady orange light that was not blinking like the standard flashing light a plane or helocopter would have.  at the time i was outside smoking and noticed it as i looked up.  i know a lot about planes and helpcopters and know their capabilities and that was definatly not anything i've seen.  my girlfriend also witnessed the event and she has come to the same conclusion.  the sky was clear and the ufo was flying at an angle so it could not have been a falling star.  i lost sight of the object after it went beyond visual range.  it's speed was about that of a small military jet but as i said any plane or helocopter would have made noise at the altitude it was travelling.
content.summary: The object was moving at high speed and flying no higher than 250 feet

content.detailedDescription: I was in the backyard letting the dog out and looking at the sky.  i noticed the object because of the colors.  i wondered what the oject could be. we have viewed this object for about a week with binoculars.  it stays in the sky for hours at a time.  it has multiple colors that seem to be along its perimeter...I would have to guess star-like or possibly circular...So i am not sure of the shape. i have taken a picture but do not have a floppy drive to see if anything will show up...I couldn't see the object in my viewfinder. i will re-post if the photo shows anything.
content.summary: Multicolored object in sky a little south and east of tinker afb

content.detailedDescription:
i was up to my place on moosehead lake for star watching. the skies were extremely clear and moonlight was very minimal, showing the milky way and even satallites to the naked eye.
 i brought a high powered telescope to spend a few nights looking at the sky with hopes of getting good images of whatever i could see. 
 there is scant to no high altitude air traffic in that area at night, such as jets and, when there is, they always are travelling east/west. 
 my place is on the southwest area of moosehead lake. i set my scope almost straight up and at an angle slightly to the northwest, aiming to the right of the milky way's band - at it's edge.
  i was setting the sight on the thing by trying to find a satallite, which i did, and ranging out from there. as i was doing this a light travelled through the scopes line of sight at a very, very high altitude.
  it was simply white and looked the same as any given star in the sky. in comparision to stars, it appeared as a "middle sized" star, not the brightest, not the dimmest, but right in the middle of those "classes". 
  it was easy to track it with the telescope as, at first, it was travelling in a straight line at an unknown speed and height. it looked and moved, for all purposes, as an airplane flying at 50,000 ft or better. that kind of speed and movement, although it was just one white, clear, sharp, unblinking light.
  it was heading, at first, straight west, away from my position. it travelled that way for about 10 seconds and i, although a little curious about it, was about to dismiss it when it took a sudden and sharp turn to straight north. it travelled the same way as i described above due north for about 15 seconds and then turned again, another 90 degree turn, to straight east for another period of about 15 seconds. it's speed remained constant at all times, slightly slower by just a little as to how a jet airplane looks as it tracks across the sky. that kind of speed.
  it then took another turn at about 45 degrees, heading southeast directly back over my position for another 15 seconds, then took a very sharp 135 degree turn back towards the west.
  it began repeating this pattern over and over for about 10 minutes. what was very interesting was that the pattern, 2 90 degree turns, a 45, and then a sharp 135 back to the original position changed each time the light went around it's course. the 45 degree turn would be made one turn sooner with each pass, directly followed by the 135, then 2 more 90 degree turns.
  the turns appeared to be made as if you were drawing an angle and kept your pen moving through the angle, kind of slightly rounded, but still quite acute. it kind of reminded me of how a billiard ball glances and bounces off a pool table rail - kind of soft yet changes direction suddenly. it would be completely impossible for a common airplane, or even a warplane, to make such turns as that light did. 
  although it was very hard to guage the exact altitude and speed, i would say - if i had to guess with only the skygazing experience i have - that the light was at least 70-80,000 ft high and travelling at about 10 miles a minute. but this is only a guess made with only slightly more than amatuer experience.
  seeing nothing more than a moving light through the telescope, (it was very dark), i stopped looking through the scope and was able to watch with my naked eyes. 
  after about 10 minutes of the same pattern being repeated as i described above the light stopped moving altogether and almost seemed to blend right in with the surrounding stars. it was as if i took my eye off it, i wouldn't be able to pick it back out of the night sky. so i kept my eyes directly on the light for about a minute or so. 
  i was starting to think that maybe i was just seeing things when the light started moving again to the southwest. it travelled the same way as above for about 5 seconds, turned sharply to the northwest, and just shot away, building up to amazing speed, (using my "math" to try and figure it's original speed, and using 10 miles a minute as my baseline, i would say it built up to at least 3500 mph within a 15 mile span), and was gone with no return. 
 at no time did i hear any noise or any sonic boom, anything like that. 
  i have spent countless hundreds of hours watching the night sky, it is one of my favorite things to do - especially up there where there are no city lights and such to interfere with skywatching. i have seen some truly strange things over the years, but all could be explained somewhat regularly. in 20 years, this light was something of the sort i have never seen before, or even supposed could exist as it did. and, no, it was most definately not a searchlight of any kind.
 making the turns as it did and accelerating so quickly like that just doesn't seem possible to me. although i do believe that life exists throughout our universe, i also have believed that - even if an advanced something or another that could travel through space from points unknown exists/existed - the nature of time throughout the universe would make our visiting each other, (2 different, intelligent species), an impossibility. such as if one society rises and falls somewhere in the universe, can travel the stars, all that - but time has seen them come and go millenia ago.
 i have always thought that time was the great divider between us ever realizing with full proof that intelligent life exists as ours does.

  now i'm not so sure.
  that light carried a lot of meaning in it for me, in it's impossibility, improbability, and definate existance.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Extremely high altitude light moving at angles and traveling away at high speed from a slow speed

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 2:30am friday september 26, 2008 i witnessed a v shaped air craft flying horizontal i would guess at around 500 feet. it could have been triangle shaped but from what i could tell it was a v. it had 5 lights that were very dull and not blinking or changing colors. one light was right behind the front (point of v) and each side had two lights. these lights were all circular. this object and the lights on it could not be seen without my night vision scope. it was traveling to the south/south west at a steady speed which wasn't that fast. it made absolutely no noise. i see planes at all hours of the day and night here and they all make noise. this thing was completely silent. the total time i witnessed it was about 2 minutes or so. i then came inside the house and told my wife what i had seen. 
i will definitely be looking into getting a night vision/camera setup.
content.summary: V shaped craft seen through night vision scope

content.detailedDescription: Here are some photos. enjoy. watch for the eyes!
content.summary: Austin: bizarre clouds often. dim clusters of star-like lights maneuvering wildy at high altitude. bright star like objects flashing red-blue-green.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my balcony.I saw a high beam light come out of the sky.I imediatly  called out to my two sons," i saw something" they were in the living room.I told them what i had seen.It was solid white.It was wider at the top,smaller at the bottom.The high beam seem to end far behind westchester county,maybe even conneticut.It started up and came down. it happened all in a matter of 3-4 seconds.It appeared like top to bottom,then disappeared,all at once.That was the first and last time i ever saw any thing like that.I was facing the hudson river with westchester in the  back ground.So i was facing east.Im not sure of the day but sure of the month (october2007) and year.
content.summary: I saw a high beam light.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were out for a walk in the evening it was completely dark and the sky was clear. as we were walking we were looking at the star's when i noticed 2 small light's that looked like star's zig-zagging across the sky. one would move at a high rate of speed and cover a great distance then stop dead, the other would do the same keeping up with the first. my girlfriend and i both witnessed it and were both in agreement that nothing of this planet could do what these 2 light's were doing. the most puzzling thing about these light's were that they would stop dead and they appeared to be in outer space not in the sky or in our atmosphere. i am 100% convinced that what i saw was a ufo. i have seen sattelite's and aircraft at night and this was of no comparison as they can't stop dead in the sky or zig zag like these lights were doing. these light's took about 5 minute's to go from horizon to horizon which is incredibly fast. it was an amazing sight and we were privlidged to see it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 2 small distant light's zipping across space irradically, covering a large area in very little time.

content.detailedDescription:
I was heading outside to see whether i needed to put frost netting on my gardens as it was supposed to be a clear, cold night. i looked up to see whether it was a clear night - or had clouded over (it was starting to cloud over - light wispy clouds) - and noticed a bunch (roughly 9) of bright coloured lights (some red (3), some green (6)) travelling in an easterly direction in a rough diamond like formation.

the lights looked like little fluorescent balls.

it continued in this formation, moving at the same speed, until it had moved out of sight (horizon , distance wise).

it was probably in sight for about 1 minute.

i am not sure what it was - but i know what it wasnt. i have spent many nights out in the spa pool and have seen planes, satellites and shooting stars on many occasions - this was not any of them.

afterwards i was excited and bewildered - but also disappointed that no one else was home to see it too. i then attempted to make contact with the local meteorolgical and astrnomical societies - to advise them on what i saw - as maybe someone else saw it too.
content.summary: Bright lights travelling in formation - some green (6), some red (3)

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i drove to work every day from goldfield nevada to a nearby gold mining claim in the mountains above the small town of lida nevada.
one day, shortly after turning off hiway 95 at the cottentail ranch and driving toward lida on hiway 266, we spotted a rather large whitish-silvery elongated ball-like (oval) object flying low and hugging the base of the mountain ranges. i drove faster to see if i get to that location before it flew away but there was at least a 6 mile stretch of desert between us, and it was moving too fast. it flew from north to south at a speed slower than a jet or missle but much too fast for a baloon.
the whole event took place in about 12-15 seconds. 

now the interesting part of all this is that some months later, i was watching a documentary on tv about people who had been sneaking up the top of the mountains at the nevada bombing range and taking photos of the buildings and such, hoping to catch a picture of something interesting. 
one of the photos that was shown was of a large air strip with a hanger. here, in front of that hanger, was exactly what i saw flying about months earlier.
i searched the internet to find that photo with no luck.

the object flew very smooth and kept it's speed the whole time. it followed the mountain terrain perfectly. never zigged-zagged.
there were no wings, windows, lights or markings of any kind that i could see. it could be likened to a large flying chicken egg, whith the larger of the eggs oval ends both front and back. (ie. no pointy end).
the object flew out of site between the mountains.

i have never seen anything like it before or since.
content.summary: White-silver oval shaped object flying low along the base of the mountains.

content.detailedDescription: I lived on the beach front in a condo in pt. vallarta, second floor. one night we noticed this flashing light, way up in the sky. it was moving, but staying stationary in it's place.. i got the video camera and when i was able to 'close up' on it, it looked almost like a strange energy force, multi-colored and moving very rapidly, but staying in the same spot. almost like a squiggly line moving in every direction and changing color. i've never seen anything like it. it stayed there for hours, then it would disappear for a while, then reappear. it wasn't there every night, but did come and go over a period of a few weeks. then, we never saw it again. i have hours of video footage of it. the video is on a minidv8 tape. i could send it to you but i want it back of course. let me know.
content.summary: Over the bay in pt. vallarta, a strange, multicolored flashing light.. almost like a ball of energy.
